entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 24 March 2023
